叮.definition: to sting or bite (of mosquito, bee etc); to say repeatedly; to urge insistently; to ask repeatedly; to stick to a point; (onom.) tinkling or jingling sound

叮叮噹噹.definition: (onom.) ding dong; jingling of bells; clanking sound

叮咚.definition: (onom.) ding dong; jingling of bells; clanking sound

叮問.definition: to question closely; to make a detailed inquiry; to probe; to ask repeatedly

叮噹.definition: (onom.) ding dong; jingling of bells; clanking sound

叮噹響.definition: (onom.) ding dong; jingling of bells; clanking sound

叮嚀.definition: to warn; to urge; to exhort; to give instructions carefully and insistently

叮囑.definition: to warn repeatedly; to urge; to exhort again and again
